verses.verse: <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Spirit <WG4151> Expressly <WG4490> Speaks, <WG3004> That <WG3754> In <WG1722> Latter <WG5306> Times <WG2540> Shall Depart From <WG868> Some <WG5100> The <WG3588> Faith, <WG4102> Giving Heed <WG4337> To Spirits <WG4151> Deceiving <WG4108> And <WG2532> Teachings <WG1319> Of Demons <WG1140>
In <WG1722> Hypocrisy <WG5272> Of Speakers Of Lies, <WG5573> Being Cauterized <WG2743> <WG3588> As To Their Own <WG2398> Conscience, <WG4893>

Forbidding <WG2967> To Marry, Bidding <WG1060> To Abstain <WG567> From Meats, <WG1033> Which <WG3739> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Created <WG2936> For <WG1519> Reception <WG3336> With <WG3326> Thanksgiving <WG2169> For The <WG3588> Faithful <WG4103> And <WG2532> Who Know <WG1921> The <WG3588> Truth. <WG225>
Because <WG3754> Every <WG3956> Creature <WG2938> Of God Is <WG2316> Good, <WG2570> And <WG2532> Nothing <WG3762> To Be Rejected, <WG579> With <WG3326> Thanksgiving <WG2169> Being Received; <WG2983>
It Is Sanctified <WG37> For <WG1063> By <WG1223> Word <WG3056> God's <WG2316> And <WG2532> Intercourse With Him . <WG1783>

These Things <WG5023> Laying Before <WG5294> The <WG3588> Brethren, <WG80> Good <WG2570> Thou Wilt Be <WG2071> A Servant <WG1249> Of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> Being Nourished <WG1789> With The <WG3588> Words <WG3056> Of The <WG3588> Faith, <WG4102> And <WG2532> Of The <WG3588> Good <WG2570> Teaching <WG1319> Which <WG3739> Thou Hast Closely Followed. <WG3877>
<WG3588> But The <WG1161> Profane <WG952> And <WG2532> Old Wives ' <WG1126> Fables <WG3454> Refuse, <WG3868> <WG1128> But Exercise <WG1161> Thyself <WG4572> To <WG4314> Piety; <WG2150>

<WG3588> <WG1063> For Bodily <WG4984> Exercise <WG1129> For <WG4314> A Little <WG3641> Is <WG2076> Profitable, <WG5624> <WG3588> <WG1161> But Piety <WG2150> For <WG4314> Everything <WG3956> Profitable <WG5624> Is, <WG2076> Promise <WG1860> Having <WG2192> Of Life, <WG2222> Of That Which Is <WG3588> Now <WG3568> And <WG2532> Of That Which Is <WG3588> Coming. <WG3195>
Faithful Is <WG4103> The <WG3588> Word <WG3056> And <WG2532> Of All <WG3956> Acceptation <WG594> Worthy; <WG514>

<WG1519> <WG5124> For, For This <WG1063> Both <WG2532> We Labour <WG2872> And <WG2532>, Are Reproached, <WG3679> Because <WG3754> We Have Hope <WG1679> In <WG1909> A God <WG2316> Living, <WG2198> Who <WG3739> Is <WG2076> Preserver <WG4990> Of All <WG3956> Men, <WG444> Specially <WG3122> Of Believers. <WG4103>

No One <WG3367> Thy <WG4675> <WG3588> Youth <WG3503> Let Despise, <WG2706> But <WG235> A Pattern <WG5179> Be <WG1096> Of The <WG3588> Believers <WG4103> In <WG1722> Word, <WG3056> In <WG1722> Conduct, <WG391> In <WG1722> Love, <WG26> In The <WG1722>, Spirit, <WG4151> In <WG1722> Faith, <WG4102> In <WG1722> Purity. <WG47>
Till <WG2193> I Come, <WG2064> Give Heed, <WG4337> <WG3588> To Reading, <WG320> <WG3588> To Exhortation, <WG3874> <WG3588> To Teaching. <WG1319>

<WG3361> Be Not Negligent <WG272> Of The <WG3588> In <WG1722> Thee <WG4671> Gift, <WG5486> Which <WG3739> Was Given <WG1325> To Thee <WG4671> Through <WG1223> Prophecy <WG4394> With <WG3326> Laying On <WG1936> Of The <WG3588> Hands <WG5495> Of The <WG3588> Elderhood. <WG4244>

These Things <WG5023> Meditate On, <WG3191> In <WG1722> Them <WG5125> Be, <WG2468> That <WG2443> Thy <WG4675> <WG3588> Advancement <WG4297> Manifest <WG5318> May Be <WG5600> Among <WG1722> All. <WG3956>

Give Heed <WG1907> To Thyself <WG4572> And <WG2532> To The <WG3588> Teaching; <WG1319> Continue <WG1961> In Them; <WG846> <WG5124> For This <WG1063> Doing, <WG4160> Both <WG2532> Thyself <WG4572> Thou Shalt Save <WG4982> And <WG2532> Those That <WG3588> Hear <WG191> Thee. <WG4675>
